title: Rachael Lee and Braith Anasta out in Sydney's Coogee beach with daughter Gigi
text:
Newly-engaged Rachael Lee enjoyed a relaxing day at the beach with her fiancé Braith Anasta and their one-year-old daughter Gigi on Friday.

The personal trainer took to Instagram to share series of photos of the family enjoying the hot Sydney weather at Coogee Beach.

The brunette beauty was seen carrying her beaming lookalike daughter as they splashed around in the water.

Fun in the sun! Bikini-clad Rachael Lee enjoyed a day out at Sydney's Coogee Beach with her fiancé Braith Anasta and their one-year-old daughter Gigi, on Friday

Notably missing from her hand was her stunning diamond engagement ring from her former NRL player beau, which she likely kept away in a safe place.

Another snap showed Rachael hand-in-hand with her little one as she walked closer to the sea.

It was then Braith's turn to take his adorable bub into the sea, where Gigi appeared to be mesmerised by the glimmering water.

Braith and Gigi then returned to the shore where they played in the sand with her toy buckets and spades.

Keeping cool: The brunette was seen splashing around in the water with adorable Gigi

Water baby! It was then Braith's turn to take his adorable bub into the sea, where Gigi appeared to be mesmerised by the glimmering water

Missing from the trio's day out at the beach was Braith's daughter Aleeia, five, with ex wife Jodi Gordon, and Rachael's son Addison, eight, from a previous relationship - who were likely at school.

Rachael's sweet family outing comes after she revealed that she and her fiancé plan to tie the knot in 2021.

'We're not planning on becoming Husband & Wife until sometime in 2021,' she wrote in an Instagram post asking her followers on advice for venue and location ideas.

She also hinted that she and Braith are currently considering hosting their wedding on a 'Greek Island'.

Play time! Braith and Gigi later returned to the shore where they played in the sand with her toy buckets and spades

Sparkler! Braith popped the question to Rachael on October 8, presenting her with an impressive diamond ring from Shannakian Fine Jewellery

Braith popped the question to Rachael on October 8, presenting her with an impressive diamond ring.

The former Sydney Roosters star was joined by their daughter Gigi, Aleeia, and Addison.

Rachael shared a video on the moment of the proposal on Instagram and wrote in the caption: 'I've never been so surprised and blown away - it was pure perfection, I'm SO in love and happy!! We're getting MARRIED.'

She added: 'Braith, thank you for a perfect morning and the best surprise ever. I love you always.'
description: Newly-engaged Rachael Lee enjoyed a relaxing day at the beach with her star fiancé Braith Anasta and their one-year-old daughter Gigi on Friday.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
